title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 117.8 - Residual Authority of the Superintendent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 117.8 - Residual Authority of the Superintendent

State Regulations

Where the method or methods used by a bank fails to
appropriately reflect the credit exposures of the bank arising from derivative
transactions, the superintendent may direct such bank to use an alternate
method or methods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
117.8

Adopted, New

York State Register October 1, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 39, eff. 10/1/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
